messages.subject: Very Interesting Stats (Legit new member Nicole)
messages.msgSnippet: I m a legit new member also.  But I have been on enough email lists and seen enough spats that I know to stick with a group during one and then see what it s
messages.messageBody:
I'm a legit new member also. But I have been on enough email lists and seen enough spats that I know to stick with a group during one and then see what it's really like after it's over.
BTW, I don't know if I have sent in an intro or not. My name is Nicole Bybee. I am married to the most wonderful Brad. We live in Idaho. We have seven wonderful sons ages 12 down to 16 months.
We have just been homeschooling/unschooling for just a little over a month...so we are VERY new to this...but enjoying it!
Anyway, I hope to see this spat resolved soon. So much more can be accomplished when we aren't trying to prove ourselves right and open our minds to a possibly new way to do things.

Nicole


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
